body.raw:
{
  "title": "Junior Python Developer",
  "description": "We are looking for a motivated Python fresher to join our backend team. The candidate will work on web applications, REST APIs, and automation scripts.",
  "required_skills": ["Python", "Django", "REST API", "Git", "SQL", "Linux", "Nginx"],
  "preferred_skills": ["Docker", "Celery", "Redis", "CI/CD", "PostgreSQL"],
  "experience_required": 0,
  "education_required": [
    "Bachelor's in Computer Science",
    "Bachelor's in Information Technology",
    "B.Tech in Software Engineering"
  ],
  "employment_type": "full_time",
  "deadline": "2025-09-30",
  "is_active": true
}
